description:
This application is designed to calculate and check the domification of a horoscope using the seven main historical methods.
It is initially based on on John D. North's program as described in his book: John D. North, Horoscopes and History, London: Warburg Institute, 1986, appendix 4, pp. 197-218.
name: Horosc for Google Sheets
programmingLanguage: Javascript for Google Sheets (Google Apps Script)
